hello.text: {i}The next patient enters the room crawling on their four limbs. You recognize the Netherworld Gardner.{s}

check.text: {i}You notice her other, better half, is missing.{s}

operate.text: {i}As you open her up, the ghost lunges at you. It seems you're going to be its next victim{s}

magic.text: {i}You try performing an exorcism. After several hours of old incantations, you manage partially purge the ghost.{s}

medicine.text: {i}The medicine partially relieves Youmu from... herself ? But the spirit's influence still lingers.{s}
